description: A simple text file developed for use by ESRI GIS applications and used by other GIS applications for aligning images with other georeferenced images and data.  A world file establishes, through numeric parameters, an image-to-world transformation that converts the image coordinates to geospatial coordinates.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: ESRI World File
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">still-image</field><field name="filenameExtension">tfw, tifw, jgw, jpgw, pgw, bpw, bipw, bmpw, blw, bilw, bqw, bsqw, btw, rcw, rlcw, sdw</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
